ProjectTitle: Uncovering a Twentieth-Century Catholic Lay Women’s Network: The Belgian “Auxiliaries of the Apostolate” (Auxilium) – Christian Humanists for Societal and Ecclesial Transformation (1945-1972)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
13/07/2022
Have you considered using tools that can help with data management such as the reference manager Zotero (www.zotero.org) which uses Dublin Core metadata? Another tool that may be handy is Tropy (https://tropy.org), this specifically designed to organize and annotate  images. For text mining NVivo may be handy, for more information: https://admin.kuleuven.be/icts/english/research/software/Nvivo/nvivo. 
If you like to learn more about these and other tools you can always request a meeting via rdm@kuleuven.be.
label: good with suggestions
